EmailTemplate.subject: August 2016 Honeywell Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NEWS | July Channel Newsletter PRIMUS ELITE ADVANCED FEATURES As more operators begin to look at upgrading their displays units to the DU-875, it pays to know what features they want in 2016. Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/news-listing/2016/june/honeywell-makes-an-elite-flight-deck]]> 50 YEARS OF THE TPE331 We're celebrating the TPE331's 50th anniversary with a new webpage to highlight the history, exciting new features and much more for you and your interested operators.
Learn More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/products/engines/tpe331-turboprop-engine]]> CPAB DISCUSSES AGING AIRCRAFT STRATEGY On June 7th and 8th, Honeywell conducted its first Channel Partner Advisory Board with over 13 different channel partners represented.
Read More AOG AT RIO 2016 Are your operators flying into Brazil for the summer games? Make sure they have all the information necessary to get the support they need from Honeywell's AOG service. Learn More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/blogs/2016/july/flying-into-the-2016-summer-olympics]]> In Other News...
Aspire 200 Sales Training Webinar: Honeywell conducted a sales training Webinar for its market-leading Aspire 200 satellite communications system for helicopters, laying out the system’s key attributes, operator benefits, and sales “best practices” for our helicopter channel partners.
To listen to an on-demand version of the Webinar, access it here <[[https://honeywell.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1109110]]> and use the password HONEYWELL (case sensitive). For questions or for more information, email Tim Roberts <[[mailto:timothy.roberts@honeywell.com]]>, Honeywell’s senior technical sales manager for satcom systems. Excess Engine and APU Inventory:

The Honeywell Channel Marketing Team
If your team hasn't already taken advantage of Honeywell's channel marketing services, now's the time to do it. As an authorized Honeywell service center, you have access to a marketing team that is dedicated to help you sell Honeywell solutions more efficiently. Email Jeremy Dingman <[[mailto:jeremy.dingman@honeywell.com]]> today to learn more. © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> This message was sent to name@website.com.
